summary:
Project / Program Manager - with experience in all stages of the project (program) life cycle: from pre-sale negotiations, presentations, preparation of tender documents, proposals, estimates, contracts to project planning, project implementation, project completion.
Customer focus, problem-solving, flexibility and communication skills are my strengths.
My qualifications are confirmed by the Ukrainian Project Management Association (UPMA), which is a member of the International Project Management Association - IPMA. (I have UPMA C.01.00501 certificate). I took a course from Scrum master.
I am a purposeful, responsible, reliable and hardworking person. Thanks to the use of modern effective methodologies and tools in my work (methodologies of Agile and Waterfall, Scrum, Jira, MS Project, etc.) for project management, working in a team or on my own, I always achieve the set results on time.
Stress resistance and flexibility are the hallmarks of my character.
All this gives me unique competencies regarding the possibility of effective cooperation in the work of the Project Office (PMO).

My last position was the head of the Program for local modernization of telecommunications networks of Ukrtelecom JSC* using alternative telephony (FMC - Fixed Mobile Convergence). The program covers almost all functional areas of the Company and is cross-functional. To effectively manage the Program, a separate business process regulation has been developed and implemented in the company. As a result, the involved performers effectively interact with related areas, they manage to avoid mistakes in the implementation of the Program stages.

(*JSC Ukrtelecom - the largest fixed communication operator in Ukraine, with the largest Internet coverage and an extensive optical network, with a staff of more than 10,000 employees. Today the company provides its services to almost 6.5 million active fixed-line telephony subscribers, more than 1.6 million customers have chosen fixed high-speed Internet. https://ukrtelecom.ua ; https://www.linkedin.com/company/ukrtelecom)

You can contact me by phone +31649143976 or kozak243@gmail.com
